title: Co-doped MnS/NiS/Ni3S2 grown in situ on hydrophilic nickel foam for energy-efficient urea-assisted alkaline hydrogen production
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2659-2667
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00442F, Paper
Haojie Ma, Muzaffar Ahmad Boda, Yang Zhou, Chenhao Shi, Zhiguo Yi
The Co-MnS/NiS/Ni3S2/HNF heterostructure electrocatalyst exhibits remarkable catalytic activity and catalytic stability as a self-supported bifunctional electrode for UOR and HER.
